app.boxmate

Class Ticket

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.boxmate.Ticket

  • public class Ticket
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a virtual ticket with show information and can be used at the actual production.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0 (24/05/2012)
    Author:
    Jonathan Tan

      A constructor for the Ticket class that requires the user/program to specify all the attributes as parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ticket

        public Ticket()
        The default constructor for the Ticket class. It will assign all the values of the attributes to default values.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • Ticket

        public Ticket(long ID,
      Customer customer,
      Show show,
      Showing showing,
      int row,
      int seat)
        A constructor for the Ticket class that requires the user/program to specify all the attributes as parameters.
        Parameters:
        ID - The unique identification code for this ticket.
        customer - The customer with which the ticket is associated with.
        show - The show this ticket is for.
        showing - The particular showing that this ticket is for.
        row - The row to which the customer is assigned.
        seat - The seat to which the customer is assigned.
        Since:
        1.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • print

        public boolean print()
        Sends the ticket to a printer to print. Returns if the job was successful.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the print job was successful.
        Since:
        1.0.0
